block.silentgems.chaos_flower_pot.desc1: Amplifies glow rose light, and places
block.silentgems.chaos_flower_pot.desc2: phantom lights up to 15 blocks away.
block.silentgems.fluffyblock.desc1: Reduces fall damage. The amount depends
block.silentgems.fluffyblock.desc2: on the number of blocks that are below
block.silentgems.supercharger.desc2: Requires chaos, charging agent, and 4 pillars (see wiki)
block.silentgems.supercharger.desc3: Yes, there's no texture yet. But the block works.
block.silentgems.teleporter.linkFail: §4Failed to link teleporters! Was one removed?
item.silentgems.chaosorb.desc: Stores Chaos energy. May break if drained when low on charge.
buff.silentgems.recharge.desc: Generates Chaos when not in use
item.silentgems.drawing_compass.desc: Draws imaginary circles in the world. Can be dyed to change color.
item.silentgems.glowrose_fertilizer.desc: Grows glow roses. Say that three times fast!
item.silentgems.holding_gem.desc: Can store large quantities of a single block and place them
item.silentgems.return_home_charm.notBou: Not bound. Right-click on a Teleporter.
item.silentgems.return_home_charm.notSan: §cDestination Y is less than or equal to zero! Try re-linking!
item.silentgems.return_home_charm.notSaf: §cDestination obstructed! There is a solid block at head level!
item.silentgems.skill_orb.max_level: The skill is already at the maximum level.
item.silentgems.summon_kitty.desc: A much less annoying way to get cats.
item.silentgems.gear_soul.desc1: Craft with a tool or armor piece.
item.silentgems.gear_soul.desc2: Allows the item to level up and gain skills.
item.silentgems.chaos_crystal_shard.desc: Are you some kind of wizard, or something?
item.silentgems.iron_potato.desc: The potato that does not compromise.
item.silentgems.magnifying_glass.desc: Let me take a closer look...
item.silentgems.mystery_goo.desc: Feels right at home in space.
item.silentgems.nameplate.desc: Renames items or entities. Name in an anvil, then craft with an item.
item.silentgems.potato_on_a_stick.desc: This joke was so old, I removed it.
item.silentgems.meaty_stew_uncooked.desc: You might want to heat it up first.
item.silentgems.candy_cane.desc: It isn't much, but this is my gift to you!
donut.silentgems.2: You're on fire! But not literally this time.
donut.silentgems.3: Somehow, every bite is a different flavor.
donut.silentgems.4: You can hear the colors of the donut.
donut.silentgems.7: The donut whispers in a tiny voice... "Tell your friends!"
enchantment.silentgems.gravity.desc: Improves harvest speed while flying or underwater.
enchantment.silentgems.ice_aspect.desc: Slows and continuously damages the victim.
enchantment.silentgems.life_steal.desc: Heals the user for a small portion of damage dealt.
Weakens and continuously damages the victim.
advancements.silentgems.root.title: Silent's Gems
advancements.silentgems.chaos_altar.desc: Craft and place a chaos altar. It can charge items with chaos or perform transmutations.
advancements.silentgems.chaos_flower_pot: Craft a chaos flower pot and plant a glow rose in it.
advancements.silentgems.chaos_gem.title: Power Up
advancements.silentgems.chaos_gem.descri: Craft a chaos gem and at least one rune
advancements.silentgems.chaos_orb_1.desc: Craft a fragile chaos orb. Don't let it get too low.
advancements.silentgems.chaos_orb_2.desc: Craft a refined chaos orb. It's less likely to break.
advancements.silentgems.chaos_orb_3.desc: Craft a perfect chaos orb. Unbreakable!
advancements.silentgems.chaos_pylon.desc: Craft and place either type of pylon.
advancements.silentgems.get_all_gems_end: Find every type of gem in the End
advancements.silentgems.get_all_gems_net: Find every type of gem in the Nether
advancements.silentgems.get_all_gems_ove: Find every type of gem in the overworld
advancements.silentgems.get_chaos_essenc: Smelt chaos ore to get chaos essence
advancements.silentgems.get_chaosore.des: Mine chaos ore with a harvest level 3 pickaxe (diamond-tipped)
advancements.silentgems.get_diamond_tips: Craft a diamond-tipped upgrade, then apply it to your pickaxe (or other tools)
advancements.silentgems.get_enchantment_: Craft some enchantment tokens. Get the enchantments you want... for the right price.
advancements.silentgems.get_enderore.des: Mine ender essence ore with a harvest level 4 pickaxe (supercharged gem)
advancements.silentgems.get_fluffy_block: Craft a fluffy block. What happens if you fall on them?
advancements.silentgems.get_gem.title: Shinies Acquired!
advancements.silentgems.get_gem.descript: Mine any gem ore with a harvest level 2 pickaxe (iron-tipped)
advancements.silentgems.get_glow_rose.de: Pick up a glow rose. It emits a little bit of light.
advancements.silentgems.get_hardened_roc: Mine any type of hardened rock. Could something good be underneath?
It's like a torch bandolier, but for any block you like!
advancements.silentgems.get_iron_tips.de: Craft an iron-tipped upgrade, then apply it to your pickaxe (or other tools)
advancements.silentgems.get_material_gra: Craft a material grader to enhance tool materials. It runs faster with a chaos supply!
advancements.silentgems.get_pickaxe.desc: Craft a Silent's Gems pickaxe. May I suggest flint?
advancements.silentgems.get_soul_gem.des: Acquire a soul gem from a monster, animal, or plant
advancements.silentgems.get_super_gem.de: Craft a supercharged gem for more power! Don't forget the material grader.
advancements.silentgems.get_tool_soul.de: Craft a tool soul, then apply it to a tool, weapon, or armor piece
advancements.silentgems.get_torch_bandol: Craft a torch bandolier. It holds a few torches.
advancements.silentgems.grow_fluffy_puff: Plant and grow a few fluffy puffs
Use a teleporter linker to link two teleporters of any kind.
advancements.silentgems.node_mover.title: Node Moved
advancements.silentgems.node_mover.descr: Get a node mover and use it to move a chaos node
advancements.silentgems.return_home_char: Craft a return home charm and link it to a teleporter (anchors are fine)
jei.silentgems.chaosaltar.desc: A block that can store Chaos. It will recharge Chaos-storing items placed in it. Place near Nodes and/or Pylons. It can also transmute certain items. Most transmutations also require a catalyst, which is not consumed.
jei.silentgems.chaosflowerpot.desc: A flower pot that amplifies the light of Glow Roses. Not only that, it will place phantom lights in the nearby area wherever they are needed. The phantom lights can be easily destroyed if necessary, and will disappear shortly after the flower pot is removed.
jei.silentgems.chaosnode.desc:
Chaos Nodes pour out various energies into the world. Most notably they produce Chaos energy, which certain blocks and items require to function.

Some have reported Nodes doing other things as well, such as attacking monsters and healing the injured.

Nodes cannot be picked up like ordinary blocks. You will need an item like the Chaos Node Mover to move them.
jei.silentgems.chaospylon0.desc: Produces Chaos energy out of nothing, similar to Nodes. Unlike Nodes, it only produces Chaos. They have no other effects, so don't expect them to defend your base.
jei.silentgems.chaospylon1.desc: Produces Chaos energy from burnable fuel. Anything that a furnace can burn will work! They produce far more Chaos per tick than Passive Chaos Pylons. These blocks only produce Chaos and have no other effects.
jei.silentgems.materialgrader.desc: Analyzes tool materials, bringing out their potential. Each piece will get a random grade that applies a percentage bonus to each stat. Requires Chaos to function, so place it near Nodes or Pylons. Load materials into the first slot, then be patient. Graded items can be extracted from the bottom.
jei.silentgems.gem.desc: Gems are used for constructing and repairing tools and armor. A single tool or armor piece can be made with multiple types of gems. Craft gems next to a tool or armor piece to repair it.
jei.silentgems.fluffypuffseeds.desc: Fluffy Puff Seeds can be obtained in the same manner as vanilla seeds. When planted on farmland, they will grow into a plant that produces Fluffy Puffs.
jei.silentgems.torchbandolier.desc: The torch bandolier stores a large number of torches. To place torches, just right-click. Torches will be absorbed automatically if auto-fill is on. To toggle auto-fill, right-click the air while sneaking. Swing the bandolier (left-click) while sneaking to remove a stack of torches (you should probably disable auto-fill first).
